title: Live Music Fridays
description: Join us every Friday evening for live acoustic music featuring local artists. Great food, great music, great times!

title: Senior Tuesday Special
description: Every Tuesday, seniors 65+ receive 15% off their entire meal (regular 10% discount increased to 15% on Tuesdays).

title: Kids Eat Free Wednesdays
description: Children 12 and under eat free with the purchase of an adult entree every Wednesday. One free kids meal per adult entree.

title: Sunday Brunch Special
description: All-you-can-eat brunch buffet featuring scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, pancakes, fresh fruit, and more!
